welcome_text: Bookworm is an independent New York bookstore and language school with locations in Manhattan and Brooklyn. We specialize in travel books and language classes.

story.title: Our story
story.paragraph1: The name Bookworm was taken from the original name for New York International Airport, which was renamed JFK in December 1963.
story.paragraph2: Our Manhattan store has just moved to the West Village. Our new location is 170 7th Avenue South, at the corner of Perry Street.
story.paragraph3: From March 2008 through May 2016, the store was located in Flatiron District.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: One of the last travel bookstores in the country, our Manhattan store carries a range of guidebooks (all 10% off) to suit the needs and tastes of every traveler and budget.
vision.paragraph2: We believe that a novel or travelogue can be just as valuable a key to a place as any guidebook, and our well-read, well-traveled staff is happy to make reading recommendations for any traveler, book lover, or gift giver.
